divs: Sighting Details Kalispell Montana 7:25 pm very very bright orange light hovering . lights out, it's blackness stands out beneath the clouds. Looks blurry buts it's infocus. My son and I just saw a craft exhibit some incredible things. To shook to explain. Thank you
